verses.text: \w Of|strong="H6588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Maskil. Blessed \w is|strong="H6588"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* whose \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5375"\w*, whose \w sins|strong="H6588"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7423"\w* whose \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w count|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H7307"\w* \w him|strong="H2803"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* whose \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w deceit|strong="H7423"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w kept|strong="H2790"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* became brittle \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w groaning|strong="H7581"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w drained|strong="H2015"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w heat|strong="H2725"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w acknowledged|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hide|strong="H3680"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w forgave|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w godly|strong="H2623"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*. \w Surely|strong="H2063"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w rise|strong="H4325"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H4672"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w*.

You are \w my|strong="H5341"\w* \w hiding|strong="H5643"\w* \w place|strong="H5643"\w*. You \w protect|strong="H5341"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H5437"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*; You \w surround|strong="H5437"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w* with \w songs|strong="H7438"\w* \w of|strong="H5341"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H6405"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w instruct|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* should \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w give|strong="H3289"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w watch|strong="H5869"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

Do \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w or|strong="H5483"\w* \w mule|strong="H6505"\w*, \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* understanding; \w they|strong="H1077"\w* must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* controlled \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w bit|strong="H4964"\w* \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w bridle|strong="H7448"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* make \w them|strong="H7126"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w but|strong="H7563"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w surrounds|strong="H5437"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w ones|strong="H6662"\w*; \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
